title.native: 亜人ちゃんは語りたい

description: Succubus, Dullahan and Vampire. They are known as Ajin, or "demi"s and are slightly different than the average human. They have lived alongside humans for ages under persecution. However, in recent years, they have become accepted as members of society. This story follows a high school biology teacher who has a great interest in demis and his interaction with the various demis in his school, each with their own cute problems.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Dullahan
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a Dullahan, a creature from Irish Folklore with a head that can be detached from its main body.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Succubus
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a succubus, a creature in medieval folklore that typically uses their sexual prowess to trap and seduce people to feed off them.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Fairy Tale
tags.description: This work tells a fairy tale, centers around fairy tales, or is based on a classic fairy tale.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

title.native: 亜人ちゃんは語りたい
亜人ちゃんは語りたい 亜人ちゃんの夏休み

node.description:
Currently freelance he resides in Tokyo. Yoshioka is a member of the Writers' Guild of Japan and the Television and Radio Writers' Association of Japan.

[Website](http://www.takawo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/takawoy) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/takawoyy)

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.

[Official Site](https://www.phantasia.jp/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/3pasiofficial/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5WmX340gDNLIAyUcg4MzWN) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/3_phantasia) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4lk0Ob-F3ptOQUUq8s0pzQ)

Sangatsu no Phantasia is a Japanese music unit which is signed to Sacra Music. It consists of vocalist [Mia](https://anilist.co/staff/272155/Mia), whose music videos and promotional images are illustrated by various artists. The unit began activities in 2015 when it uploaded its first song "Day Break" on YouTube, before making its major debut in 2016. In addition to producing music, Mia also writes novels, with some of the unit's songs being based on her novels.

**Members:** 

- Vocals: [Mia](https://anilist.co/staff/272155/Mia)
- Composer: [Scop](https://twitter.com/scopscop)
- Illustrator: [Natsu Asami](https://twitter.com/72desuyo)
- Composer: [n-buna](https://twitter.com/nabuna2)
- Composer: [Yuuyu](https://twitter.com/yuuyu_ssry)
- Composer: [40mp](https://twitter.com/40mP)
- Composer: [buzz-G](https://twitter.com/buzz_g)

[Website](https://trysail.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/trysail_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuI2in6tTAjsaqzdeOeWZkQ) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/trysail_official_goods/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3YmAt9U9INQwxAwfgMVfKD)

A seiyuu girl group belonging to Music Ray'n agency under Sony Music Japan. They also host A&G+ Radio "TriAngle Harmony" together.

__Members:__
• [Momo Asakura](https://anilist.co/staff/118479/Momo-Asakura)
• [Sora Amamiya](https://anilist.co/staff/116517/Sora-Amamiya)
• [Shiina Natsukawa](https://anilist.co/staff/118818/Shiina-Natsukawa)

Though he was a Physics major at Chiba University, he joined an Anime Research Club that inspired him to enter the industry. He started as a Production Assistant affiliated with [A-1 Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/561/A1-Pictures) and gradually moved to directorial roles.

Though he was a Physics major at Chiba University, he joined an Anime Research Club that inspired him to enter the industry. He started as a Production Assistant affiliated with [A-1 Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/561/A1-Pictures) and gradually moved to directorial roles.
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/takuopa)__

**Takuya Matsushita** is a Japanese animation planner and producer.
